rows.label: qst101804_msg001
rows.name: Temp implementation of LIST_QST101804

rows.label: qst101804_msg002
rows.name: I want to forget about Jizo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0001
rows.name: Vahsah~! I finally found you, mo~

rows.label: qst101804_msg0002
rows.name: Huh? Who are you?

rows.label: qst101804_msg0003
rows.name:
It's Jizo, mo~! I lost
a little weight, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0004
rows.name: No way, you're kidding!

rows.label: qst101804_msg0005
rows.name:
Jizo stopped moving at
Badfella's Cave Fort.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0006
rows.name:
To me, who is heartbroken
after my Driver died...

rows.label: qst101804_msg0007
rows.name: Hm? Who are you?

rows.label: qst101804_msg0008
rows.name: You brought Jizo? Really?

rows.label: qst101804_msg0009
rows.name:
...It certainly is Jizo's wavelength!
You were alive! That's great!

rows.label: qst101804_msg0010
rows.name:
Vahsah, you're as terrible as ever,
mo~ Don't kill Jizo off, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0011
rows.name:
If Jizo dies, Vahsah will turn
into a Core Crystal too, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0012
rows.name:
Come to think of it,
that's right. ...Uh oh.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0013
rows.name:
I thought I'd turn back into a Core
Crystal soon and my memories and debts
would disappear, so I spent a lot...

rows.label: qst101804_msg0014
rows.name:
Mo~ Vahsah~ Even if your memories
disappear, your debts won't, mo~!

rows.label: qst101804_msg0015
rows.name: Hahaha! That's true~!

rows.label: qst101804_msg0016
rows.name: I'm not okay at all...

rows.label: qst101804_msg0017
rows.name: It's that old lady.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0018
rows.name:
I promised that I wouldn't leave this
city until I paid back my debts.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0019
rows.name:
What kind of promise
did you make, mo...?

rows.label: qst101804_msg0020
rows.name:
I was planning to live it up in
this city and then turn back
into a Core Crystal, you see.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0021
rows.name: Don't worry, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0022
rows.name:
I have some savings for
times like this, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0023
rows.name:
I hid a treasure chest
near the Colonnade, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0024
rows.name: That's my Driver!

rows.label: qst101804_msg0025
rows.name: Ehehe, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0026
rows.name:
Jizo and Vahsah help
each other out, mo~

rows.label: qst101804_msg0027
rows.name:
Though people do say
we're a bit strange.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0028
rows.name:
Please, mo. I need your help
to get my savings, mo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0029
rows.name:
Sorry about this... I'm
counting on you for Jizo.

rows.label: qst101804_msg0030
rows.name:
Vahsah, please wait quietly without
spending any more money, mo~

rows.label: qst101804_msg0031
rows.name: Yeah! I'll do my best.
